protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for 3-OH-octanoid acid mediates a negative feedback regulation of adipocyte lipolysis to counteract prolipolytic influences under conditions of physiological or pathological increases in beta-oxidation rates. Acts as a low affinity receptor for nicotinic acid. This pharmacological effect requires nicotinic acid doses that are much higher than those provided by a normal diet

go_class.description: purinergic nucleotide receptor activity, g-protein coupled
cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
